    next_smallest([5, 1, 4, 3, 2]) == 2
    next_smallest([]) == None

    if len(lst) == 2:
        return lst[0]
    return next_smallest(lst[1:])

    next_smallest([5, 1, 4, 3, 2]) == 2

    """

        return lst[0]
    return next_smallest(lst[1:])
